title: Practice-Centered Online Education for Strengthening Academic and Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Comprehensive program for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to acquire information literacy for academic research and practical documentation

learning_goals: Learners can select credible information from at least three academic databases and perform critical evaluations.
Learners can produce ethical and systematic documents by utilizing plagiarism prevention tools and reference management systems when writing academic papers and reports.
Learners can establish and implement personalized information management strategies (filtering/archiving) to address information overload in digital environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
